biome.name: Swamp
biome.description: Tall, gnarled trees flourish across the surface of this forested world. Sunlight filters past dangling vines, to the saturated undergrowth below.

hazards.name: Rainstorms
hazards.description: Torrential rainstorms reduce visibility.

biome.name: Wasteland
biome.description: The lifeless grey of this planet is interrupted only by the violet flowers that grow from strange, parasitic outcroppings.

hazards.name: Thick Fog
hazards.description: Dense fog lightly reduce visibility for both enemy and friendly units.

biome.name: Swamp
biome.description: Tall, gnarled trees flourish across the surface of this forested world. Sunlight filters past dangling vines, to the saturated undergrowth below.

hazards.name: Rainstorms
hazards.description: Torrential rainstorms reduce visibility.

biome.name: Desolate
biome.description: Scorching temperatures, high winds, and low precipitation cause a near-constant cycle of fires to sweep this planet, punctuated by short bursts of lush rebirth between infernos.

hazards.name: Intense Heat
hazards.description: High temperatures increase stamina drain and speed up heat buildup in weapons.

hazards.name: Fire Tornadoes
hazards.description: Planet is ravaged by deadly fire tornadoes.

biome.name: Desolate
biome.description: Scorching temperatures, high winds, and low precipitation cause a near-constant cycle of fires to sweep this planet, punctuated by short bursts of lush rebirth between infernos.

hazards.name: Intense Heat
hazards.description: High temperatures increase stamina drain and speed up heat buildup in weapons.

hazards.name: Fire Tornadoes
hazards.description: Planet is ravaged by deadly fire tornadoes.

biome.name: Desolate
biome.description: Scorching temperatures, high winds, and low precipitation cause a near-constant cycle of fires to sweep this planet, punctuated by short bursts of lush rebirth between infernos.

hazards.name: Intense Heat
hazards.description: High temperatures increase stamina drain and speed up heat buildup in weapons.

hazards.name: Fire Tornadoes
hazards.description: Planet is ravaged by deadly fire tornadoes.

biome.name: Toxic
biome.description: Dense, toxic fumes from deep within the planet's crust seep out of cracks in the earth and coat the ground in a sickly haze.

hazards.name: Acid Storms
hazards.description: Corrosive acid storms temporarily reduce armor effectiveness for both enemy and friendly units.

biome.name: Ethereal
biome.description: This world teems with ethereal, boundless, and peculiar plant life that spreads silent and uninterrupted across its entire surface.

hazards.name: None
hazards.description: This planet's environment is not yet known, or has no environmental modifiers.

biome.name: Canyon
biome.description: This arid, rocky biome covering this world has driven the evolution of exceptionally efficient water usage in its various organisms.

hazards.name: Tremors
hazards.description: Frequent earthquakes stun players and enemies alike.

biome.name: Foggy Swamp
biome.description: Squelching mud, twisting roots; the odor of rot and anarchy. A teeming, endless morass.

hazards.name: Thick Fog
hazards.description: Dense fog lightly reduce visibility for both enemy and friendly units.

biome.name: Wasteland
biome.description: The lifeless grey of this planet is interrupted only by the violet flowers that grow from strange, parasitic outcroppings.

hazards.name: Thick Fog
hazards.description: Dense fog lightly reduce visibility for both enemy and friendly units.

biome.name: Toxic
biome.description: Dense, toxic fumes from deep within the planet's crust seep out of cracks in the earth and coat the ground in a sickly haze.

hazards.name: Acid Storms
hazards.description: Corrosive acid storms temporarily reduce armor effectiveness for both enemy and friendly units.

biome.name: Crimsonmoor
biome.description: A crimson algae has propagated wildly across this entire planet, coating its rocky hills with a constant red that masks the spilt blood of the heroes who defend it from tyranny.

hazards.name: Intense Heat
hazards.description: High temperatures increase stamina drain and speed up heat buildup in weapons.

biome.name: Winter
biome.description: Submerged in eternal winter, this world's frosty peaks glimmer in the light of its too-distant star.

hazards.name: Extreme Cold
hazards.description: Icy temperatures reduce rate of fire and delay heat buildup in weapons.

hazards.name: Blizzards
hazards.description: Intense blizzard reduce mobility and moderately reduce visibility for both enemy and friendly units.

biome.name: Icemoss
biome.description: Ice and moss-covered rock can be found across most of the surface of this planet.

hazards.name: Extreme Cold
hazards.description: Icy temperatures reduce rate of fire and delay heat buildup in weapons.

biome.name: Moon
biome.description: A rocky, lonely moon with extremely valuable mineral deposits underneath the surface.

hazards.name: Extreme Cold
hazards.description: Icy temperatures reduce rate of fire and delay heat buildup in weapons.

hazards.name: Meteor Storms
hazards.description: Meteors impact the surface causing massive damage.

biome.name: Desert
biome.description: A desert planet prone to unpredictable and dangerous sand twisters.

hazards.name: Intense Heat
hazards.description: High temperatures increase stamina drain and speed up heat buildup in weapons.

hazards.name: Tremors
hazards.description: Frequent earthquakes stun players and enemies alike.

biome.name: Highlands
biome.description: Rocky outcroppings punctuate fields of tall grass in a planet dominated by misty highland terrain.
